Title: Sharp Install
Description: SharpInstall provides Managed interfaces to the MSI (Windows Installer) Automation model. Now MSI Installers (databases) can be created in managed code like C#, Boo etc
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SharpInstall provides Managed interfaces to the MSI (Windows Installer) Automation model. Now MSI Installers (databases) can be created in managed code like C#, Boo etc
